snippet: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic fought back in a 5-7, 6-2, 6-3 win over the qualifier Thomaz Bellucci and reached the Italian Open quarterfinals in Rome.
abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Thomaz Bellucci to reach Italian Open tennis tournament quarterfinals; other matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic fought back in a 5-7, 6-2, 6-3 win over the qualifier Thomaz Bellucci and reached the Italian Open quarterfinals in Rome.

headline.main: Djokovic Rallies Past a Qualifier at Italian Open
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Djokovic Rallies Past a Qualifier
